how he'd been tricked and made complicit in a
crime, he agreed at once to help when I asked
it of him.

他告诉我说自己是被欺骗

我要求他协助我，他接受了。

An angel and his apostle share a linked fate.
Should the apostle die, the angel bound by the
Sigil would begin to die as well.
